document_data.name: Draevyn Thornbolt
document_data.mainbody: '''Draevyn Thornbolt''' was an [[albino]] [[wizard]] in [[Neverwinter]] sometime after the [[War of the Silver Marches]].
document_data.Activities: Draevyn was a captain on the employ of [[Dagult Neverember]], captaining the ''[[Seabreaker]]''. He had an affable [[half-orc]] brute as a first mate. He always dressed impeccably.
document_data.History: In the late 1480s or early 1490s [[DR]], Draevyn was hired to accompany an adventuring party to [[Svardborg]].
